title: when a diana with only 8 cs 15 minutes into the game can still 1v1 everyone on your team

replies.body:
Apparently your team has no Magic Resist.

I recommend going to the shop, checking out the stuff in the "Magic Resist" section, and getting something from there.  I like hexdrinker, though that green armor thingy works great too and goes great with healing stuff.  Or you can do both and just spam laugh as she does no damage to you.
Yeah anyone can kill an AFK player or fucking stupid player eventually. What's the problem?

> [{quoted}](name=Joxcab,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7wE6QtkW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-25T01:08:06.673+0000)
>
> Yeah anyone can kill an AFK player or fucking stupid player eventually. What's the problem?

she wasnt afk she just didnt farm alot
I was talking about your team being AFK or fucking stupid to die to that Diana.
This is a very informative thread.
